title: PBE account disabled?!?!??
body: So my PBE summoner name is called "Sk1lledOnion".It got suddently disabled and i don't know the reason.I didn't play for one week because i didn't want to wait for the patch to download.Can i get my account enabled? I made a ticket but i really don't know if it will work because  i forgot my sign-up email adress because i made the account younger.I know the current email adress.Can you help me?

replies.body: I took a look at the PBE account and it seems there was some suspicious activity on the account. If you submit a ticket for an [Account Recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we'll look into helping you get that account back in your hands.
I  want  to  get  one PBE acc .  What i  need to  do  to get one ?
